content: summary tape measure cover crocheted in 3 pieces - a solid piece to encase the tape measure and two wings that are sewn on materials needed size 7/1 65mm crochet hook 1 skein of gold crochet thread in size 10 1 skein of white crochet thread in size 10 only a small amount is needed additional gauge information this pattern is meant to cover a round 2 diameter tape measure *this pattern will be available soon as a free ravelry download *
